20110107082514.000|20110107082516.000|CC1|MOVIE, IS A LOT OF IT NOT       
20110107082516.000|20110107082517.000|CC1|THERE?                          
20110107082517.000|20110107082519.000|CC1|>> FOR THE MOST PART I WAS
